articles.title: New proposal to lower Medicare age to 50 could be a lifeline to millions - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Research shows many Americans nearing retirement worry about retaining health coverage.
articles.content:
New proposal to lower Medicare age to 50 could be a lifeline to millions
A group of 21 Democratic senators have reintroduced legislation in Congress to lower the qualifying age for Medicare from 65 … [+5276 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Hong Kong-Singapore air travel bubble to start on May 26 - Bloomberg News - Reuters
articles.description: Hong Kong and Singapore will announce a May 26 start to their long-delayed air travel bubble between the two cities, Bloomberg News reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
articles.content: People look at a Singapore Airlines plane, amid the spread of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19), at a viewing gallery of the Changi Airport in Singapore October 12, 2020. REUTERS/Edgar Su/File Photo… [+791 chars]
